title: John Fitzgerald Kennedy National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Summer Hours (May 21-October 31, 2016)  Open Wednesday through Sunday, from 9:30am-5:00pm. Information on guided house tours is available on our guided tours page. For more information on neighborhood walking tours please visit our outdoor activities page.   Winter Hours (November 1, 2016- May 20, 2017) Closed. Tours of the home are available by appointment, Monday-Friday, dependent on staff ability. To ensure staff availability, please make your reservation two weeks in advance by calling the site at 617-566-7937 or email us. *We are unavailable for tours December 17 - December 27.      Â     A ranger presents a backyard talk during the summer season. NPS
